Package org.netbeans.api.editor.settings

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttributesUtilities
    A collection of utility menthods for working with AttributeSets.
    CodeTemplateDescription
    The definition of a code template.
    CodeTemplateSettings
    The list of code templates available for particular mime paths.
    EditorStyleConstants
    Style Constants for Fonts and Colors AttributeSets.
    FontColorNames
    Fonts and Colors settings names
    FontColorSettings
    The map of coloring names and their parameters.
    KeyBindingSettings
    The list of available key bindings.
    MultiKeyBinding
    Variant of JTextComponent.KeyBinding to hold several successive keystrokes.
    SimpleValueNames
    The names of SimpleValuesSettings.
